00076         class TestOfAnnotations extends UnitTestCase {
00077                 public function testReflectionAnnotatedClass() {
00078                         $reflection = new ReflectionAnnotatedClass('Example');
00079                         $this->assertTrue($reflection->hasAnnotation('FirstAnnotation'));
00080                         $this->assertTrue($reflection->hasAnnotation('SecondAnnotation'));
00081                         $this->assertFalse($reflection->hasAnnotation('NonExistentAnnotation'));
00082                         $this->assertIsA($reflection->getAnnotation('FirstAnnotation'), 'FirstAnnotation');
00083                         $this->assertIsA($reflection->getAnnotation('SecondAnnotation'), 'SecondAnnotation');
00084                         
00085                         $annotations = $reflection->getAnnotations();
00086                         $this->assertEqual(count($annotations), 2);
00087                         $this->assertIsA($annotations[0], 'FirstAnnotation');
00088                         $this->assertIsA($annotations[1], 'SecondAnnotation');
00089                         $this->assertFalse($reflection->getAnnotation('NonExistentAnnotation'));
00090                         
00091                         $this->assertIsA($reflection->getConstructor(), 'ReflectionAnnotatedMethod');
00092                         $this->assertIsA($reflection->getMethod('exampleMethod'), 'ReflectionAnnotatedMethod');
00093                         foreach($reflection->getMethods() as $method) {
00094                                 $this->assertIsA($method, 'ReflectionAnnotatedMethod');
00095                         }
00096                         
00097                         $this->assertIsA($reflection->getProperty('exampleProperty'), 'ReflectionAnnotatedProperty');
00098                         foreach($reflection->getProperties() as $property) {
00099                                 $this->assertIsA($property, 'ReflectionAnnotatedProperty');
00100                         }
00101                         
00102                         foreach($reflection->getInterfaces() as $interface) {
00103                                 $this->assertIsA($interface, 'ReflectionAnnotatedClass');
00104                         }
00105                         
00106                         $this->assertIsA($reflection->getParentClass(), 'ReflectionAnnotatedClass');
00107                 }
00108                 
00109                 public function testReflectionAnnotatedMethod() {
00110                         $reflection = new ReflectionAnnotatedMethod('Example', 'exampleMethod');
00111                         $this->assertTrue($reflection->hasAnnotation('FirstAnnotation'));
00112                         $this->assertFalse($reflection->hasAnnotation('NonExistentAnnotation'));
00113                         $this->assertIsA($reflection->getAnnotation('FirstAnnotation'), 'FirstAnnotation');
00114                         $this->assertFalse($reflection->getAnnotation('NonExistentAnnotation'));
00115                         
00116                         $annotations = $reflection->getAnnotations();
00117                         $this->assertEqual(count($annotations), 1);
00118                         $this->assertIsA($annotations[0], 'FirstAnnotation');
00119                         
00120                         $this->assertIsA($reflection->getDeclaringClass(), 'ReflectionAnnotatedClass');
00121                 }
00122                 
00123                 public function testReflectionAnnotatedProperty() {
00124                         $reflection = new ReflectionAnnotatedProperty('Example', 'exampleProperty');
00125                         $this->assertTrue($reflection->hasAnnotation('SecondAnnotation'));
00126                         $this->assertFalse($reflection->hasAnnotation('FirstAnnotation'));
00127                         $this->assertIsA($reflection->getAnnotation('SecondAnnotation'), 'SecondAnnotation');
00128                         $this->assertFalse($reflection->getAnnotation('NonExistentAnnotation'));
00129                         
00130                         $annotations = $reflection->getAnnotations();
00131                         $this->assertEqual(count($annotations), 1);
00132                         $this->assertIsA($annotations[0], 'SecondAnnotation');
00133                         
00134                         $this->assertIsA($reflection->getDeclaringClass(), 'ReflectionAnnotatedClass');
00135                 }
00136                 
00137                 public function testReflectionClassCanFilterMethodsByAccess() {
00138                         $reflection = new ReflectionAnnotatedClass('Example');
00139                         $privateMethods = $reflection->getMethods(ReflectionMethod::IS_PRIVATE);
00140                         $this->assertEqual(count($privateMethods), 1);
00141                         $this->assertEqual($privateMethods[0]->getName(), 'justPrivate');
00142                 }

00147                         $this->assertEqual(count($privateProperties), 1);

00163                 public function testMultipleAnnotationsOnClass() {
00164                         $reflection = new ReflectionAnnotatedClass('MultiExample');
00165                         $annotations = $reflection->getAllAnnotations();
00166                         $this->assertEqual(count($annotations), 3);
00167                         $this->assertEqual($annotations[0]->value, 1);
00168                         $this->assertEqual($annotations[1]->value, 2);
00169                         $this->assertEqual($annotations[2]->value, 3);
00170                         $this->assertIsA($annotations[0], 'FirstAnnotation');
00171                         $this->assertIsA($annotations[1], 'FirstAnnotation');
00172                         $this->assertIsA($annotations[2], 'SecondAnnotation');
00173                 }
00174

00233                 public function testClassWithNoAnnotationParentShouldNotBeParsed() {

00240                 public function testCircularReferenceShouldThrowError() {
00241                         $this->expectError("Circular annotation reference on 'SelfReferencingAnnotation'");
00242                         $reflection = new ReflectionAnnotatedClass('SelfReferencingAnnotation');
00243                         $reflection->getAnnotations();
00244 
00245                         $this->expectError("Circular annotation reference on 'IndirectReferenceLoopAnnotationHelper'");
00246                         $reflection = new ReflectionAnnotatedClass('IndirectReferenceLoopAnnotation');
00247                         $reflection->getAnnotations();
00248                 }

00250                 public function testConstInAnnotationShouldReturnCorrectValue() {
00251                         $reflection = new ReflectionAnnotatedClass('ClassAnnotatedWithStaticConstant');

00253                         $this->assertEqual($annotation->value, Statics::A_CONSTANT);
00254                 }

00256                 public function testBadConstInAnnotationShouldCauseError() {
00257                         $this->expectError("Constant 'Statics::UNKNOWN_CONSTANT' used in annotation was not defined.");
00258                         $reflection = new ReflectionAnnotatedClass('ClassAnnotatedWithNonExistingConstant');
00259                         $annotation = $reflection->getAnnotation('FirstAnnotation');
00260                 }
00261 
00262                 public function testNestedAnnotationSupport() {
00263                         $reflection = new ReflectionAnnotatedClass('ClassAnnotatedWithNestedAnnotations');
00264                         $this->assertEqual(count($reflection->getAnnotations()), 1);
00265                         $annotation = $reflection->getAnnotation('FirstAnnotation');
00266                         $this->assertIsA($annotation, 'FirstAnnotation');
00267                         $this->assertIsA($annotation->key, 'SecondAnnotation');
00268                         $this->assertEqual($annotation->key->value, 3.14);
00269                 }
00270 
00271                 public function testAnnotationWithoutNamespaceShouldBeRecognized() {
00272                         $reflection = new ReflectionAnnotatedClass('ClassAnnotatedWithNamespacedAnnotation');
00273                         $this->assertTrue($reflection->hasAnnotation('AnnotationWithNamespace'));
00274                 }

00278         
00279         class TestOfPerformanceFeatures extends UnitTestCase {
00280                 public function setUp() {
00281                         AnnotationsBuilder::clearCache();
00282                 }
00283 
00284                 public function tearDown() {
00285                         AnnotationsBuilder::clearCache();
00286                 }
00287         
00288                 public function testBuilderShouldCacheResults() {
00289                         $builder = new MockedAnnotationsBuilder;
00290                         $reflection = new ReflectionClass('Example');
00291                         $builder->build($reflection);
00292                         $builder->build($reflection);
00293                         $builder->expectOnce('getDocComment');
00294                 }

00297         class TestOfSupportingFeatures extends UnitTestCase {
00298                 public function setUp() {
00299                         Addendum::resetIgnoredAnnotations();
00300                 }
00301                 
00302                 public function tearDown() {
00303                         Addendum::resetIgnoredAnnotations();
00304                 }
00305         
00306                 public function testIgnoredAnnotationsAreNotUsed() {
00307                         Addendum::ignore('FirstAnnotation', 'SecondAnnotation');
00308                         $reflection = new ReflectionAnnotatedClass('Example');
00309                         $this->assertFalse($reflection->hasAnnotation('FirstAnnotation'));
00310                         $this->assertFalse($reflection->hasAnnotation('SecondAnnotation'));
00311                 }
